Test.TestName: NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6
Test.Name: [BUG.1] DNS Issue: additional SearchDomain
Test.Description:
[BUG.1] DNS Issue
In test cases 6.2.6 and 6.2.7 (Set DNS Configuration) the tool will expect the SearchDomain values to be removed. This is the recommended behavior, but the tool will incorrectly fail this test case for NVT’s that keep the SearchDomain values. Vendors are therefore allowed to send a Test Report for Declaration of Conformance where these test cases fail because of this issue. Note, the SearchDomain values might be mandatory to remove in future releases of the tool.

Test.TestName: NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6
Test.Name: DHCP is not OFF (No Hello)
Test.Description: Check NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6 test when DUT return correct response (FromDHCP = true, no SearchDomain, no DNSManual).

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-2-1-7 SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6
STEP 1 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that original DNS configuration returned from the DUT STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get network interfaces Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check if DHCP must be turned off STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Set network interface interface token = eth0 IPv6 DHCP = Off IPv6 Address = 2001:1:1:1:1:1:1:2 [64] Transmit done Receive done reboot need = False STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Waiting for Hello message from NVT Warning: no Hello within timeout STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - No Hello - guessing right address Selecting http://[2001:1:1:1:1:1:1:2]:11569/onvif/ServiceDevice10/DeviceServiceFake.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Set DNS configuration A socket operation was attempted to an unreachable network 2001:1:1:1:1:1:1:2:11569 STEP FAILED
STEP 9 - Restore DNS configuration A socket operation was attempted to an unreachable network 2001:1:1:1:1:1:1:2:11569 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.TestName: NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6
Test.Name: DHCP is not OFF (Reboot needed, no reboot message)
Test.Description: Check NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6 test when DUT return correct response (FromDHCP = true, no SearchDomain, no DNSManual).

Test.TestName: NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6
Test.Name: Correct response: FromDHCP = true, no SearchDomain, no DNSManual
Test.Description: Check NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6 test when DUT return correct response (FromDHCP = true, no SearchDomain, no DNSManual).

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-2-1-7 SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6
STEP 1 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that original DNS configuration returned from the DUT STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get network interfaces Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check if DHCP must be turned off DHCP is OFF STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Set DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Wait 10,000 seconds to allow the DUT to apply settings STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Check that current DNS configuration returned from the DUT STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check current DNS configuration FromDHCP: expected - False, actual - False DNSManual: expected - 2001:1:1:1:1:1:1:1 should be presented, actual - Array of 1 elements {[IPv6 - '2001:1:1:1:1:1:1:1']} DNSFromDHCP: expected - No DNSFromDHCP, actual - NULL STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Restore DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.TestName: NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6
Test.Name: Correct response: Disabled IPv6
Test.Description: Check NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV6 test when DUT return correct response (FromDHCP = true, no SearchDomain, no DNSManual).

STEP 7 - Get DNS configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Check that current DNS configuration returned from the DUT STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check current DNS configuration FromDHCP: expected - False, actual - False DNSManual: expected - 2001:1:1:1:1:1:1:1 should be presented, actual - Array of 1 elements {[IPv6 - '2001:1:1:1:1:1:1:1']} DNSFromDHCP: expected - No DNSFromDHCP, actual - NULL STEP PASSED
